objects.text:
• Vintage twin-bell design for classic charm
• Loud bell sound ensures reliable wake-ups
• No batteries needed - mechanical operation
Limited time offer. While stocks last.

product_details.name: Classic Mini Twin-Bell Alarm Clock - Retro Style Wake-Up Companion
product_details.description:
• Vintage-inspired twin-bell design for classic charm
• Compact size perfect for bedside tables and desks
• Clean white color scheme fits any room décor
• Easy-to-read analog display with bold numbers
• Traditional mechanical operation - no batteries needed
• Loud twin-bell sound ensures reliable wake-up calls
• Durable metal construction built to last
• Manual wind-up mechanism for reliable timekeeping
• Adjustable alarm setting with simple turn mechanism
• Portable and lightweight design for travel use
• Nostalgic appearance with modern reliability
• Perfect blend of form and function

banner_details:
This banner features a clean, modern layout with a visually striking split design. The left section, in a soft peach background, houses all text-based content, while the right section includes a product image of a classic twin-bell alarm clock, dynamically overlaid on a muted beige backdrop. At the top, the "heading" text layer uses bold and impactful typography in a vibrant coral shade to announce an urgent promotion. Directly below is the "subheading" in a sharper, tech-styled font introducing the product. The "description" text provides three bullet-point features in a crisp, readable layout. The "price" layer stands out with enlarged coral text. A solid-colored rounded "cta_button" rectangle contains a "cta" label prompting immediate action in white. At the bottom is a small "tagline" for legal or stock disclaimers. The banner also includes subtle geometric patterns and decorative dots for visual interest, especially on the right half.

**Color Palette:**
- Coral Red: `#D9614B`
- Warm Beige: `#FFF5EB`
- Sandy Tan: `#F5E6D8`
- Soft Brown: `#555555`
- Deep Gray: `#333333`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a classic analog alarm clock with a minimalist color palette centered around white and black. The primary color is a smooth, glossy white (#FFFFFF), used for the clock body and bells, which communicates simplicity and cleanliness. Subtle gray highlights (#D1D3D4) add depth and dimensionality, indicating metallic reflection. The numbers and clock hands are a deep black (#000000), offering strong contrast for readability. A hint of soft blue-gray (#BCC7D1) is used on shadows around the bells and base, adding a cold, crisp tone. These colors are smoothly blended while each ensures visual clarity and emphasis on form.
